Uses of Interface
org.bremersee.comparator.ComparatorBuilder

Packages that use ComparatorBuilder
Package
Description
org.bremersee.comparator
This package contains general mechanism for comparing and sorting objects.

    Method
    Description
    default ComparatorBuilder
    ComparatorBuilder.add(String field)
    Adds a default comparator for the given field (the value of the field must be comparable).
